description: Triangle of numbers related to Eulerian numbers.
references: D. Singh, The numbers L(m,n) and their relations with prepared Bernoulli and Eulerian numbers, Math. Student, 20 (1952), 66-70.
formula: a(m, n) = Sum C(m, n)*L(m-r, n-1), L = Eulerian numbers.E.g.f.: exp(x*y)*(exp(x)-1)*(y-1)/(y*exp(x)-exp(x*y)). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 20 2003
mathematica: egf = Exp[x*y]*(Exp[x]-1)*((y-1)/(y*Exp[x] - Exp[x*y])); row[n_] := Last[ CoefficientList[ Series[egf, {x, 0, n}, {y, 0, n}], {x, y}]]*n!; Flatten[ Table[ row[n], {n, 1, 10}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Dec 20 2012, after _Vladeta Jovovic_ *)
crossrefs: Cf. A008292, A046802. Row sums give A002627.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
